subject: Welcome to MedSpa Analytics Pro - Onboarding Started
body:
Dear Dr. John Smith,

Welcome to MedSpa Analytics Pro! We're excited to help you transform your practice with AI-powered analytics.

**Your Onboarding Journey:**
We've created a personalized onboarding plan with 5 steps designed specifically for Sample Medical Spa.

**Next Steps:**
1. Review your onboarding plan in the customer portal
2. Schedule your platform setup session
3. Prepare your team for training

**Your Dedicated Team:**
- Customer Success: Sarah Johnson
- Technical Support: Mike Chen
- Integration: Lisa Rodriguez

**Timeline:** 3 weeks to full implementation
**Support:** 24/7 technical support available

We'll be in touch within 24 hours to schedule your first session.

Welcome aboard!

Best regards,
The MedSpa Analytics Pro Team

attachments.name: onboarding_plan.pdf
attachments.content:

    {

      "description": "Connect your PMS and payment systems",
      "duration": "2-4 hours",
      "status": "pending",
      "assignee": "Integration Team",

        "api_documentation.pdf"
      ]

    {
      "step": 3,
      "title": "Custom Configuration",

      "duration": "1-2 hours",

        "configuration_guide.pdf",
        "best_practices.pdf"
      ]
    },
    {
      "step": 4,

      "status": "pending",

      "resources": [
        "training_materials.pdf",
        "video_tutorials.zip"
      ]
    },
    {
      "step": 5,

      "description": "Launch with dedicated support",
      "duration": "1 week",
      "status": "pending",

        "support_guide.pdf",
        "emergency_contacts.pdf"

    }
